name: Create Zoho Inventory adjustments for new Android barcode scans (UPC)
description: Every time a UPC barcode is scanned with the [Make Android App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.integromat.android), Make will automatically create an inventory adjustment in Zoho Inventory for the matching item. Then, an Android push notification is sent to notify the user about the completion of the adjustment.
